verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration policy] [R-ARG0: that] [V: separates] [ARG1: migrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] began in May to discourage parents from bringing children across the border illegally . Activities on Father 's Day , dubbed # FathersDayofAction , included congressional visits to detention centers , marches and vigils .
